mac_address.docs:
**MAC Address**: The MAC address of the Mopeka device.

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*

custom_distance_full.docs:
distance sensor will read when it should be considered full (100%).  This is only used when tank_type = CUSTOM

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*

custom_distance_empty.docs:
distance sensor will read when it should be considered empty (0%).  This is only used when tank_type = CUSTOM

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*

tank_type.docs:
The tank type the sensor is measuring. See below.

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
The information for the temperature sensor. This temperature is on the sensor and is not calibrated to ambient temperature.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*

level.docs:
The percentage of full for the tank sensor
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*

distance.docs:
The raw distance/depth of the liquid for the sensor in mm.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*

battery_level.docs:
The information for the battery percentage sensor.  Sensor uses a standard CR2032 battery.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Mopeka Pro Check BLE Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mopeka_pro_check.html#configuration-variables)*
